nodes.text: The Medal of Eternal Valor was a Zakuulan medal and Zakuul's highest honor. The medal was awarded to the crew of the Eternal Empire's Eternal Flagship by Emperor Valkorian after the flagship quickly disabled Balmorra's planetary defense system, allowing the Emperor's twin sons Arcann and Thexan to capture the world's weapon factories intact.

The Medal of Eternal Valor was mentioned in the Codex entry for the Eternal Flagship in the 2015 expansion Knights of the Fallen Empire to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare.
